entry.title: 代码加图片
entry.content: Markdown代码块图片1$ ls -alrt 图片#直接写图片名就好了，图片实例见下 java 代码123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118public class ParamParser{ private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger(ParamParser.class.getPackage().getName()); public static void fillParam(Query paramQuery, String paramString, QContext paramQContext) throws Exception { Parameter[] arrayOfParameter1; try { arrayOfParameter1 = getParams(paramQuery); } catch (Exception localException) { log.log(Level.SEVERE, CMDUtil.locale("cmd.param.find.fail", new String[0]), localException); throw new Exception(CMDUtil.locale("cmd.param.find.fail", new String[0])); } if ((arrayOfParameter1 == null) || (arrayOfParameter1.length == 0)) return; String[] arrayOfString1 = (CMDUtil.isEmpty(paramString)) ? new String[0] : paramString.split(";"); for (Parameter localParameter : arrayOfParameter1) { QUtil.fillQueryData(localParameter, paramQContext); int k = 0; for (int l = 0; l < arrayOfString1.length; ++l) { String str = arrayOfString1[l].trim(); int i1 = str.indexOf("="); if ((i1 <= 0) || (i1 >= str.length() - 1)) continue; String[] arrayOfString2 = str.split("="); if (!arrayOfString2[0].trim().equalsIgnoreCase(localParameter.getName())) continue; String[] arrayOfString3 = arrayOfString2[1].split(","); if (arrayOfString3.length == 1) paramQContext.set(localParameter.getName(), arrayOfString3[0]); else paramQContext.set(localParameter.getName(), arrayOfString3); k = 1; break; } if ((k != 0) || (localParameter.getValue() == null)) continue; paramQContext.set(localParameter.getName(), localParameter.getValue()); } } public static void fillParam(Query paramQuery, TaskContext paramTaskContext, QContext paramQContext) throws Exception { Parameter[] arrayOfParameter1; try { arrayOfParameter1 = getParams(paramQuery); } catch (Exception localException) { log.log(Level.SEVERE, CMDUtil.locale("cmd.param.find.fail", new String[0]), localException); throw new Exception(CMDUtil.locale("cmd.param.find.fail", new String[0])); } if ((arrayOfParameter1 == null) || (arrayOfParameter1.length == 0)) return; for (Parameter localParameter1 : arrayOfParameter1) { QUtil.fillQueryData(localParameter1, paramQContext); Parameter localParameter2 = paramTaskContext.getParam(localParameter1.getName()); if (localParameter2 != null) { paramQContext.set(localParameter1.getName(), localParameter2.getValue()); } else { if (localParameter1.getValue() == null) continue; paramQContext.set(localParameter1.getName(), localParameter1.getValue()); } } } public static void fillParam(Parameter[] paramArrayOfParameter, String paramString, SchedContext paramSchedContext) throws Exception { String[] arrayOfString1 = (paramString == null) ? new String[0] : paramString.split(";"); for (Parameter localParameter : paramArrayOfParameter) { QUtil.fillQueryData(localParameter, new QContextWrapper(paramSchedContext)); int k = 0; for (int l = 0; l < arrayOfString1.length; ++l) { String str = arrayOfString1[l].trim(); int i1 = str.indexOf("="); if ((i1 <= 0) || (i1 >= str.length() - 1)) continue; String[] arrayOfString2 = str.split("="); if (!arrayOfString2[0].trim().equalsIgnoreCase(localParameter.getName())) continue; localParameter.setValue(arrayOfString2[1].trim().split(",")); paramSchedContext.setParam(localParameter.getName(), localParameter); k = 1; break; } if ((k != 0) || (localParameter.getValue() == null)) continue; paramSchedContext.setParam(localParameter.getName(), localParameter); } } public static Parameter[] getParams(Query paramQuery) throws Exception { Parameter[] arrayOfParameter = paramQuery.getParams(null); if ((arrayOfParameter == null) || (arrayOfParameter.length == 0)) return null; Arrays.sort(arrayOfParameter, new ParamComparator()); return arrayOfParameter; }}
